## Description {#details}

Sample-based profile writer. Base class.

### LineCount {#ac9e64ece161ef85d0a4741f4890762a7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>size&#95;t llvm::sampleprof::SampleProfileWriter::LineCount</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
For writeWithSizeLimit in text mode, each newline takes 1 additional byte on Windows when actually written to the file, but not written to a memory buffer.

This needs to be accounted for when rewriting the profile.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-h/#l00150">150</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-h">SampleProfWriter.h</a>.

## Public Static Functions

### create() {#ac9f37e421f903ad877a91c1ca056f4ee}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ErrorOr&lt; std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; SampleProfileWriter &gt; &gt; SampleProfileWriter::create (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Filename, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a373137ee5de445ffb3a1dbc685cf66ec">SampleProfileFormat</a> Format)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Profile writer factory.

Create a sample profile file writer based on the specified format.

Create a new file writer based on the value of <code>Format</code>.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Filename">The file to create.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Format">Encoding format for the profile file.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
an error code indicating the status of the created writer.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-h/#l00120">120</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-h">SampleProfWriter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-cpp/#l00884">884</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-cpp">SampleProfWriter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### create() {#a61029509fbcbee90e8fc145701a79f07}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ErrorOr&lt; std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; SampleProfileWriter &gt; &gt; SampleProfileWriter::create (std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &gt; &amp; OS, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a373137ee5de445ffb3a1dbc685cf66ec">SampleProfileFormat</a> Format)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create a new stream writer based on the value of <code>Format</code>.

Create a sample profile stream writer based on the specified format.

For testing.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="OS">The output stream to store the profile data to.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Format">Encoding format for the profile file.</ParametersListItem>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
an error code indicating the status of the created writer.
